item.description:
Note: This event requires a reservation and it may or may not require a deposit by the organizer so all cancellations within 48 hours of the event requires a reason. Please do not sign up unless you are sure that you can make it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The membership has voted! The September Restaurant of the month is Fratello's Ristorante Italiano.

About the Restaurant of the Month:

Located conveniently in the heart of Manchester is one of the old mill buildings, Fratello's is a not only delicious but also has a great atmosphere. Fratello's carries a large variety of Italian fare and includes some more American food such as steak for those who are either not Italian lovers or simply not in the mood for Italian. The filet mignon is fabulous. If you are in the saucy mood then try The Northender. This entr√©e includes a large homemade meatball, Italian sausage and breaded chicken breast on top of penne pasta and smothered in mozzarella. One of the best parts is that Fratello's gives such large portions that there is always enough for another meal. They also offer an incredible homemade dessert menu as well as a full bar. Fratello's has an atmosphere that appears more expensive than the menu prices.

http://www.associated...

item.name: FAN Restaurant of the Month
